    public class RandomRobot
extends java.lang.Object
implements Robot
    A class representing a robot moving randomly through Positions in a Maze

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move()
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Move the robot to a random position adjacent to the current position of the robot (not diagonally). Only move to the previously occupied position of the robot if it is the only possible move.
        Specified by:
        move in interface Robot
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if no adjacent position is movable

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true - if the current position is a goal position
